title.rendered: Go Green: Find Your Chicago Junk Car Facility

content.rendered:
Get Cash For Junk

Cars are the most recycled item in the country. Surprised? You shouldn’t be. Nearly 12 million cars are recycled each year in the United States alone, which saves about 85 million barrels of oil from getting used to produce new or replacement parts. This incredible industry is often overlooked in sustainability conversations but it accounts for a huge amount of recycled materials on the market. If you have an old car you’re thinking of replacing, consider getting paid by a Chicago junk car yard to scrap it. There are businesses that will pay you for your junk car, even if it’s in terrible condition. Those businesses will often come to you, inspect your car, give you cash for it, and take it away. There’s really no easier way to get rid of an old broken-down car.

Find Your Junk Car

Are you a mechanical hobbyist? Do you like cars? Or are you just on a budget? Buying a junk car as a project is a fun, cheap, and educational hobby to take on. Take on the challenge of turning a fixer upper a fully functioning vehicle. And if an entire car seems a little too daunting to tackle then you can always find parts. Auto salvage yards have a constant cycle of cars coming in and out so there’s sure to be something you need.

Your Chicago Junk Car Yard

Aero Auto Partshas served Chicagoland since 1958. With over 50 years of experience, we know how to do business efficiently, effectively, and inexpensively. If you’re looking for a solution to a Chicago junk car problem, we’re the answer! Don’t let your junk car sit idle, providing you with no useful purpose or money. At Aero Auto Parts we would be happy to take it off your hands and pay you for it! By junking your car you’re not only getting paid for something you would trash anyway, you’re contributing to one of the largest recycling industries in the country. Call us today at 773-483-2626 to schedule a time for us to pick up your junk car.
